message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $12,000 is a bit higher than I was hoping for.  I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $11,000?
Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet me in the middle. I'm still not quite there.  Let's try $10,000. This would be a fair deal for both of us.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $11,500?
Alice, I understand your position.  $11,500 is still a bit high for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $10,750? It would be a good deal for both of us.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $12,000, Bob. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let's meet at $12,000
